name: Tireless
trigger: when you draw on primal endurance
effects: you gain Temporary Hit Points equal to 1d8 plus your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 1)
whenever you finish a Short Rest, your Exhaustion level decreases by 1
limits: you can use the temporary hit point action a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once)
you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest
